[新手教學] 一開波我個人會先搞o黎三樣

1. 裝 SKSE (Current build 1.7.3)
http://skse.silverlock.org
首先將三個 files copy 去你 skyrim 個 dir (唔係 DATA, 係 TESV.exe 果度)
skse_1_9_32.dll
skse_loader.exe
skse_steam_loader.dll
ok 如果冇問題你以後開 skyrim 係用 skse_loader.exe o黎 START GAME


2. 裝 FNIS (第時你 d mods 需要加新 animation 時用到)
FNIS Behavior V6_3
http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811

3. 裝 SkyUI (以後加 mods 都需要佢介面o黎做 setting)
http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863


三樣搞掂冇問題先開始裝想要既 mods 例如一開始可以先試風景


以上由NEADer巴打提供依個係佢之前高登個名

[人物美化]如果你想要美化人物, 必裝既有

1. ECE - 開黎創人用, 裝好按 ~ console, 輸入 "showracemenu" 就可以用到
http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951

2. PCEA - 角色獨立既 animation
http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71055

3. XPMSE 骨架
http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000?

4a. CBBE 體型
http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666?
4b. UNP 體型 (二選一, 以後你裝既新衫都要對應返)
http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709?

以下o黎D就個人選擇:
5. Eyes of Beauty 眼睛
http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722?

6. SG Female Eyebrows 眼眉
http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327?

7. ApachiiSkyHair 髮型
http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168?

都係由NEADer巴打提供




以上教學只適用於PC版SKYRIM
亦歡迎各位巴絲入黎討論上古卷軸嘅野 不論任何平台 因為會有講故佬解答唔係樓豬我

我理想中既精靈女係咁

So, a primer of what I've been dealing with. In Last Seed, there is a food portioning mechanic, similar to what you see in Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul. (LS defaults to using CACO's system instead of its own if both are installed, but that's neither here nor there.) You eat a big food, and it splits into smaller foods. Simple enough.

CACO implements its food portioning using magic effects on the foods. It gets to do that because it actually makes edits to the foods. In Last Seed, I've attempted to take a very hands-off approach to the food records themselves, in order to ensure maximum compatibility (including with CACO itself). That means I need to take a different approach.

So let's analyze the problem. We need to take an original food, and based on it, convert it to a portioned food, of some quantity. For instance, a bread loaf might turn into two bread pieces. A cheese wheel turns into 8 slices. etc.

If I can't store this as metadata on the food, that means I need a "single source of truth" on a script somewhere. I need to use a key (the original food) and map it to several values (the portion food, and the quantity). That sounds an awful lot like a table, doesn't it?

So let's analyze the problem. We need to take an original food, and based on it, convert it to a portioned food, of some quantity. For instance, a bread loaf might turn into two bread pieces. A cheese wheel turns into 8 slices. etc.

If I can't store this as metadata on the food, that means I need a "single source of truth" on a script somewhere. I need to use a key (the original food) and map it to several values (the portion food, and the quantity). That sounds an awful lot like a table, doesn't it?

唔洗睇教學只要用正常邏輯就知佢點運作：
姐係SKYRIM呢個天寒地凍既地方
見到落雪就要加衫 (隻game加既travel cloak, 或者winter is coming 既大褸都好暖, 睇個樣就知啦)
唔好跌去冰水, 唔係人仔溫度會跌勁快
隨時帶夠木頭用黎生火
飲湯, 飲酒都可以保暖...etc
上冬堡呢D冰天雪地既地方就一定要包哂全身, 做好避寒措施
因為幾分鐘已經可以收得皮, 當然你可以調低難度啦

呢個MOD可以話係完美, 所有MODDER要學習既榜樣

聖地鎮咪就係隻game開始個陣你比人斬頭個到
奧杜因黎劫法場，場面極之混亂，好驚咁走嘅平民、乘亂著草嘅風暴軍同疏散平民嘅帝國軍混埋一齊，可能殺錯人

如果係講緊一開始斬頭地方, 入去冇咩恐怖嘢, 一堆bandit姐
嗰陣中世紀無法無天背景, 矛插焦屍其實咪姐係宣示地盤主權, 嚇走啲普通人


即係後來聖地鎮比強盜攻佔左?
做咩帝國唔搶返嘅?

一開波果陣咪走去白漫同個領主報告話有龍攻擊聖地
但之後好似都冇跟進到
原來仲要比班強盜霸埋, 惺咁渣ga

另外仲有次係白漫城出面附近
見到有幾個人, 有男有女
之後地下仲訓左幾件男性祼屍
行埋去同佢地講野, 佢地就話唔好咁多事
仲叫我比錢佢地
我毒能性格怕事就簡左比錢, 冇開佢地拖
比完錢佢地就跑走左...
呢單又咩事嚟

聖地都比條龍鏟平左，搶番重建哂錢哂時間
同埋佢有跟進，派兵看守riverwood

比錢應該係隨機事件
強盜殺完人叫你唔好多事
有時會有班帝國兵服裝，其實係強盜黎


仲有次係行行下見到有個士兵帶頭
後面有對男女好似著新婚服飾嘅
唔知咩趕路定咩

之後我再簡對話入面有個option
類似係話問佢地唔似新婚,係咪比人迫呀? 咁
之後個士兵就開我拖
對男女就跑走左

我殺完個士兵都仲係一頭慕水
